en-US.alert_about:
Streamline and supercharge your shortcut development workflow by:

• Embedding shortcuts within other shortcuts.

• Extracting action blocks from shortcuts.

• Saving action blocks to the ActionCuts Action Blocks Library.
en-US.alert_action_comment: To embed this action into a shortcut, add a Comment action with the following line of text, which has been copied to your clipboard:
en-US.alert_donate: Thank you for donating and supporting my development of shortcuts like ActionCuts!
en-US.alert_help_1:
ActionCuts is an essential tool for developers making complex and reusable shortcuts. ActionCuts can:

• Insert shortcuts or action blocks inside of other shortcuts.

• Extract action blocks from shortcuts.

• Save action blocks in a library.

Developing shortcuts has gotten a lot easier with ActionCuts!
en-US.alert_help_3:
Follow these steps to embed shortcuts and action blocks into a shortcut:

1. Add ActionCuts Embed Comments to the target shortcut.

2. Open ActionCuts.

3. Tap Embed Shortcuts.

4. Select the target shortcut.

Any ActionCuts Embed Comments in the shortcut will be processed and replaced by the referenced shortcut or action block, provided they exist on the iOS device.
en-US.alert_help_4:
You can extract a block of actions from an existing shortcut and create a new shortcut or save to the ActionCuts Action Blocks Library.

1. In your shortcut, surround the actions you want to extract with two comments:

{{ActionCuts Extract:XYZ}}

… the actions to extract …

{{/ActionCuts Extract:XYZ}}

where XYZ is the name of your action block

2. Open ActionCuts.

3. Tap Extract Actions.

4. Select the shortcut from Step 1.

5. Save the action block in a new shortcut or into the ActionCuts Action Blocks Library.
en-US.alert_help_5:
After running the Embed Shortcuts or Extract Actions command, ActionCuts gives you the option of creating a new shortcut.

1. Tap Download Shortcut.

2. A link to the shortcut will be created on iCloud.com.

3. Mobile Safari will open to the download page.

4. Tap the link to open Shortcuts.

5. Tap Add Untrusted Shortcut at the bottom of the shortcut to add it to your Shortcuts Library.
en-US.alert_localization:
Want to see ActionCuts localized in your language?

Visit the localization page for more details.
en-US.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of ActionCuts.
en-US.error_extract_nothing: No ActionCuts Extract comments could be found in this shortcut.
en-US.error_library_none: You have no saved actions. Use the Extract Actions command to save commonly used actions from your shortcuts in the Action Blocks Library

If so, consider sending me a tip as a token of appreciation!
